txt.en: 'My scouts have returned with reports of dangerous creatures lurking on the shores of the local rivers. Since you will be heading in that direction on Glatharn's foolish errand, why not see what you can do to dispose of the creatures?'
Thalathril is located in Tham Lumren, in the northern Angle.\n\nYou should let Thalathril know that you have disposed of many riverside avanc.
The banks of the rivers that surround the Angle are home to deadly avanc. Deadly... and hungry.
'Thank you for your effort here in the Angle. It has allowed me to focus on other things of great import, and for that I thank you.'
Riverside avanc can be found along the banks of the rivers in the Angle.\n\nThalathril has asked you to dispose of the deadly avanc who plague the river-banks.
